text: Malam ngon uroe cit Kamoe peujeut Dua boh sipheut nyang saban leupah Kamoe sampoh treuk nyang sipheut malam Tinggai uroe trang that meujeureulah Mangat tamita raseuki gata O Nibak Po gata nyang Maha Murah Lom nak tateupue jeut tabileung thon Uroe ngon buleun takira mudah Bandum atranyan ka Kamoe peutrang
